1,900 hours into the game and its complete dogshit. I wish valve never bought the game 22 years ago because they made it into a complete shithole of a game. Everyone just keeps saying that I hate this game because im bad but no one has noticed for the fact that everytime you rank up for any type of game your team will be degenarets who live under a rock and dont know what crosshair placement is, on the other team though you will have people who have 4 thousand dollars computers and lvl 10 on faceit but of course theyre still in silver. So here you are will 2k hours  in the game getting shit on every single game and you keep deleting the game and coming back because you have nothing else to do in life. Everyone complains about this but valve just makes more skins. Dear Gaben, just fucking sell Counter Strike to somebody who will actually fix bugs and HITBOXES.
